item.description: We thought we would try something a little different this time around and check out some live comedy at The Comedy Studio in Harvard Square, located on the third floor of the Hong Kong restaurant. http://www.thecomedys... Afterwards we can head to the Hong Kong for a couple of drinks and dancing. Depending on how many people are interested we can buy our tickets as a group online or get them at the door. We will meet at the venue at 7:30pm for an 8pm show start.

group.name: The Boston Expat Aussie Meetup Group

item.name: Mirthsty Thursday: Live comedy at The Comedy Studio
